title: Spinach soup
ingredients: ['2 beef stock cubes', '2 organic vegetable stock cubes', '2 bay leaves', '1/2 packet frozen spinach', '7 frozen mash potato sticks', '1 (400g) tin minestrone soup', '1 pinch garam masala', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1/2 packet frozen broccoli', '1/2 packet frozen califlower']
